structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Disposition Of Cash Or Prizes Of A Person Under 21 Years Of Age
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2011, 194, Sec. 16 effective November 22, 2011.] If the person entitled to the cash or prize is under 21 years of age, the cash or prize shall be remitted to the commission and deposited into the Gaming Revenue Fund established in section 59.
